name: Barber-Surgeon
description:
A surgery minigame rush inspired by warioware and medieval medical practices.

As a barber-surgeon, it's your job to perform a mix of operations that require a slow and precise hand, or split-second decision making and coordination.

Use the arrow keys to interact.

Created for the 2023 'Fast & Slow' NOKIA JAM in 10 days, this is a beta. There are expanded mechanics and minigames on the way. It will be in development until the end of voting for the jam.
